programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: While caught up in limbo for years in Ireland's immigration system, Nigerian refugee Aisha Osagie develops a close relationship with former prisoner Conor Healy. However, their friendship soon comes under threat as Aisha's future in Ireland is jeopardised. Drama, starring Letitia Wright, Josh O'Connor and Ruth McCabe Frank Berry - Director, Frank Berry - Director Letitia Wright - Aisha Osagie Josh O'Connor - Conor Healy Ruth McCabe - Mrs Keegan Joanne Crawford - Ms Nolan Letitia Wright - Aisha Osagie Josh O'Connor - Conor Healy Ruth McCabe - Mrs Keegan Joanne Crawford - Ms Nolan.

programme.sub-title: Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2015 ║ U

programme.title: Along Came Polly
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Ben Stiller and Jennifer Aniston. Insurance company risk assessor Reuben Feffer's apparently perfect life takes a nose-dive when his new wife cheats on him during their honeymoon. Broken-hearted, he meets up with old school friend Polly Prince and romance ensues. But Polly's blasé attitude to life causes problems for overly cautious Reuben John Hamburg - Director, John Hamburg - Director Ben Stiller - Reuben Feffer Jennifer Aniston - Polly Prince Philip Seymour Hoffman - Sandy Lyle Debra Messing - Lisa Kramer Hank Azaria - Claude Bryan Brown - Leland Van Lew Alec Baldwin - Stan Indursky Jsu Garcia - Javier Michele Lee - Vivian Feffer Bob Dishy - Irving Feffer Ben Stiller - Reuben Feffer Jennifer Aniston - Polly Prince Philip Seymour Hoffman - Sandy Lyle Debra Messing - Lisa Kramer Hank Azaria - Claude Bryan Brown - Leland Van Lew Alec Baldwin - Stan Indursky Jsu Garcia - Javier Michele Lee - Vivian Feffer Bob Dishy - Irving Feffer.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. Forrest Gump wasn't born with a lot of smarts, but he is encouraged by his mother to realise his full potential. He attends college on a sports scholarship, meeting President Kennedy in the process, joins the army and is sent to Vietnam. programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: Romantic wartime thriller starring Brad Pitt and Marion Cotillard. Intelligence officer Max Vatan and Resistance agent Marianne Beauséjour fall in love and get married after working together on a dangerous mission to assassinate Nazi officers. But then Max receives disturbing information about his wife and embarks on his most trying assignment yet: to secretly test his partner's loyalty Robert Zemeckis - Director, Robert Zemeckis - Director Brad Pitt - Max Vatan Marion Cotillard - Marianne Beauséjour Jared Harris - Frank Heslop Lizzy Caplan - Bridget Vatan Daniel Betts - George Kavanagh Matthew Goode - Guy Sangster Marion Bailey - Mrs Sinclair Simon McBurney - SOE official Anton Lesser - Emmanuel Lombard Josh Dylan - Capt Adam Hunter August Diehl - Hobar Brad Pitt - Max Vatan Marion Cotillard - Marianne Beauséjour Jared Harris - Frank Heslop Lizzy Caplan - Bridget Vatan Daniel Betts - George Kavanagh Matthew Goode - Guy Sangster Marion Bailey - Mrs Sinclair Simon McBurney - SOE official Anton Lesser - Emmanuel Lombard Josh Dylan - Capt Adam Hunter August Diehl - Hobar.

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. programme.title: Elvis
programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Arts And Culture, Musical, Documentary And Factual ║ 2022 ║ 12
programme.desc: Gospel-loving singer Elvis Presley witnesses America's bitter racial divisions while continuing to support performers such as BB King and Little Richard. Falling under the spell of teenager Priscilla, he builds a home at Graceland for his parents. However, while manager Colonel Tom Parker exerts a grip over his talented asset, Elvis must choose between fame and family. programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: Period action drama, starring Tom Cruise. In 1876, after witnessing the US military brutality against native Americans, Captain Nathan Algren turns to drink to escape his battle nightmares. Hired by the young Japanese emperor to train the country's first modern, conscript army, Algren is forced to lead an inadequate campaign against the ancient line of Japanese warriors, the Samurai. But when he is captured by these alleged national enemies, he begins to doubt his mission Edward Zwick - Director, Edward Zwick - Director Tom Cruise - Captain Nathan Algren Timothy Spall - Simon Graham Billy Connolly - Sergeant Zebulon Gant Tony Goldwyn - Colonel Benjamin Bagley Ken Watanabe - Katsumoto Hiroyuki Sanada - Ujio Koyuki - Taka Shichinosuke Nakamura - Emperor Meiji Shun Sugata - Nakao Seizo Fukumoto - Silent Samurai Masato Harada - Omura Shin Koyamada - Nobutada William Atherton - Winchester Rep Togo Igawa - General Hasegawa Tom Cruise - Captain Nathan Algren Timothy Spall - Simon Graham Billy Connolly - Sergeant Zebulon Gant Tony Goldwyn - Colonel Benjamin Bagley Ken Watanabe - Katsumoto Hiroyuki Sanada - Ujio Koyuki - Taka Shichinosuke Nakamura - Emperor Meiji Shun Sugata - Nakao Seizo Fukumoto - Silent Samurai Masato Harada - Omura Shin Koyamada - Nobutada William Atherton - Winchester Rep Togo Igawa - General Hasegawa.

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: Oscar-winning black comedy starring Kevin Spacey as Lester Burnham, a disillusioned father who's suffering midlife meltdown and is increasingly alienated from grasping, estate-agent wife Carolyn (Annette Bening), sullen teenage daughter Jane and his neighbours. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. programme.title: Adult Life Skills

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Crime/detective, Family, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Turtle brothers Donatello, Leonardo, Michelangelo and Raphael have been raised in the sewers of New York by their mentor Splinter. The wise rat has sheltered his four wards from the cruelty of the human world but the brothers yearn to be accepted as normal teenagers by New Yorkers. They hope to win human hearts by performing selfless, heroic deeds with the help of their new friend April O'Neil. programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1993 ║ PG
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's blockbuster adventure, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum and Richard Attenborough. Billionaire tycoon John Hammond has built the ultimate theme park - an island populated by genetically engineered dinosaurs. A group of guests, including Hammond's grandchildren, are invited to preview the attraction, touring the park in remotely controlled cars. programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: PL 100 Club: Teddy Sheringham
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Barclays Premier League history. This episode features the best of Teddy Sheringham's 146 goals. Tweet your favourite #pl100club.

programme.title: PL Legends: Zola
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Chelsea forward Gianfranco Zola.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Coventry/Man Utd 1997
programme.desc: A look at the greatest Premier League game for each club, as voted for by fans. Here, for Coventry City, the stunning late comeback 3-2 win over Manchester United back in December 1997.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Everton/Wimbledon 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Everton, the 3-2 win over Wimbledon in 1994 that ensured the Toffees' survival.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Fulham 2008
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Fulham, the 3-2 fightback at Man City in 2008 that ignited their survival run.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Arsenal/Hull '08
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Hull City, the famous 2-1 away win at Arsenal back in September 2008.

programme.title: Premier League Years 2002/03
programme.desc: Enjoy all of the most memorable moments from the 2002-03 Premier League season, accompanied by hit music from the time, major news stories and more.

programme.title: The Big Interview: Ashley Young
programme.desc: From playing with his two brothers, to leading Aston Villa as club captain, John McGinn's story is one of strong family bonds. The Scot outlines the importance of his upbringing.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Written into Middlesbrough folklore, Brazilian midfielder Juninho Paulista signed for the club on three separate occasions. He sits down to reflect on his fond memories of that time.

programme.title: PL Retro: Chelsea v Tottenham 2016
programme.desc: Chelsea welcome London rivals Spurs to Stamford Bridge back in the 2015-16 campaign, knowing that if they denied their visitors victory, Leicester would win the title.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Sheffield United visit Chelsea in the Premier League. Chris Wilder recorded victory for the first time since returning to the Bramall Lane hot seat last week, defeating Brentford. (16.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Without victory at Selhurst since September, Palace target a much-needed three points as they take on a Brentford side who have lost their previous four in the Premier League. (30.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Palace return to Selhurst for a Premier League game with Everton. The Eagles registered victory last weekend, with goals from Jeffrey Schlupp and Tyrick Mitchell in a 2-0 away win. (11.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Palace and Fulham meet at Selhurst in the Premier League. In the absence of manager Roy Hodgson, victory was snatched from the Eagles' claws at Villa last weekend. (23.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Oliver Glasner and Crystal Palace target a return to winning ways as they welcome Luton Town to Selhurst Park. Rob Edwards' Hatters have lost their last four Premier League outings. (09.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: After victory at Bournemouth with goals from Maddison and Kulusevski, Ange Postecoglou's Spurs continue their travels with a trip to Vincent Kompany's Burnley in the Premier League. (02.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Having lost all four games here so far this season, Everton take to Goodison Park once more in search of a much-needed lift, as they entertain Bournemouth in the Premier League. (07.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Everton return to Merseyside having sealed three points in the capital previously. Here, the Toffees meet Brighton, a side without a Premier League win in their last four attempts. (04.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Sean Dyche starts his first full term in charge of Everton, as Marco Silva's Fulham provide the competition at Goodison Park on the opening weekend of the Premier League season. (12.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Off the mark with a draw at home to Wolves, Luton visit an invigorated Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin netted the winner last week in a worthy win at the Gtech for the Toffees. (30.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Lifted by a huge result earlier in the week, David Moyes visits his old club as West Ham travel to Goodison Park for a Premier League encounter with Sean Dyche's Everton. (01.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Everton host Wolves at Goodison Park in the Premier League. The two teams have endured inauspicious starts and will be desperate to secure their first points of the season here. (26.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A week after defeating Bournemouth, Fulham are back at the Cottage for the visit of Villa in the Premier League. Unai Emery's men fell at home to Manchester United last time out. (17.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Fulham and Bournemouth clash in the Premier League at the Cottage. Marco Silva's men let a two-goal lead slip away to Burnley last weekend, while a 10-man Cherries drew with Forest. (10.02).

programme.title: The Tyler Archives: Ars v Man Utd
programme.desc: Martin Tyler digs into the Premier League Archive and revisits some of his favourite moments from past games between Arsenal and Manchester United.

programme.title: The Tyler Archives: Liv v Che
programme.desc: Martin Tyler digs into the Premier League Archive and revisits some of his favourite moments from past games between Liverpool and Chelsea.

programme.title: The End Of The Storm
programme.desc: The inside story of Liverpool Football Club's 2019-2020 Premier League winning season and the mastermind manager that made it all happen - Jurgen Klopp.

programme.title: Class of '92: Full Time
programme.desc: With a playoff place the minimum expectation, an unbeaten run of games has Salford close in on the top seven. But fan unrest prompts Gary Neville to make some big changes. Ep 2.

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from an NFC divisional round matchup, as the Detroit Lions host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. The Lions haven't won multiple playoff games since 1957. (21.01).

programme.title: Wade v Thornton: Wld Grand Prix 14
programme.desc: Revisit an incredible match at the 2014 World Grand Prix of Darts, as James Wade and Robert Thornton both hit nine-darters during their round two meeting. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Bristow v Taylor: WDC SF 1997
programme.desc: Revisit a semi-final from the 1997 World Darts Championship that pitted Eric Bristow, who was enjoying one of his greatest runs in the PDC, up against Phil Taylor. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Women's State Of Origin #2
programme.desc: The Women's State of Origin series between shield holders Queensland and New South Wales continues as McDonald Jones Stadium stages game two. (06.06).

programme.desc: St Helens host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Saints ran away with a 40-10 win over Leeds Rhinos last week to go top of the table. (31.05).

programme.title: MVG v Wade: Premier Lge 2015

programme.title: Taylor v Mason 2002
programme.desc: In a match that saw the first-ever televised nine-darter, revisit this classic contest between Phil Taylor and Chris Mason at the 2002 World Matchplay. Contains flashing images.
